name: Raid Masters Online
description:
3-person multiplayer epic monster raids!
You can form an expedition with friends to go on an epic monster raid or play different game modes by yourself!

Download Raid Masters Online right now and start going on raids!

[Features]

► Raid with friends
Form a 3-person expedition with friends to go on an epic monster raid! You don't have to fight alone anymore. Get support from your friends and fight together!

► Defeat epic monsters
Defeat various epic monsters to obtain different rewards including EXP, gold, and materials for crafting items!

► Customize your Masters
Craft and enhance items to make new gear and upgrade your Masters! You can obtain materials for crafting items in battle.

► Pets, your faithful supporters
Fight together with cute yet powerful pets!
Pets can help enhance Masters’ stats and provide buffs in battle.
You can acquire higher-ranking pets by fusing pets together or collect unique pets through boss raids.

► Different battle modes
Play different solo and multiplayer modes! Try Raid mode with your friends, play Adventure mode to clear themed stages, or play Training Dungeon mode to try to stop waves of monsters!

► Grow your Masters
There are Masters to upgrade, each with their own attack style and exclusive skills. You can choose a Master at any time and start enjoying battles!

► Chat with your friends
You can chat with your friends at the square and farm items! Show your Master to your friends!


* Note: Raid Masters is free to download, but there are purchasable in-game items.
